consumer_rights.description: You have the right to confirm whether we process your personal data and to access that personal data.
You have the right to correct inaccuracies in your personal data, taking into account the nature of the data and our purposes for processing.
You have the right to delete personal data provided by or obtained about you.
You have the right to obtain a copy of your personal data in a portable and, to the extent technically feasible, readily usable format.

consumer_rights.right: Right to Opt Out of Targeted Advertising
consumer_rights.description: You have the right to opt out of the processing of your personal data for purposes of targeted advertising.

consumer_rights.right: Right to Opt Out of Sale
consumer_rights.description: You have the right to opt out of the sale of your personal data.

consumer_rights.right: Right to Opt Out of Profiling
consumer_rights.description: You have the right to opt out of profiling in furtherance of decisions that produce legal or similarly significant effects concerning you.

sensitive_data_categories: Mental or physical health diagnosis, treatment, or condition
Genetic or biometric data processed to uniquely identify a natural person
Personal data collected from a known child
